alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Johnson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Emanuel and eastern Johnson Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Wrightsville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Wrightsville, Kite, New Home, Meeks, Spann and Donovan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
